price: (Twahishuye Qur’an) kugira ngo mutazagira undi mugaragira utari Allah. Mu by’ukuri njye (Muhamadi) ndi Umuburizi wanyu uturutse kuri We (Allah), nkaba n’utanga inkuru nziza.
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
